Louisville_Jefferson_County.Rossmore Apartment House:
The Rossmore Apartment House is a demolished historic building in Downtown Louisville, Kentucky, United States.


== Description ==
The Berkeley Hotel was a five-story structure of red brick with stone and rusticated brick trim. The simplicity of line and detail, the hard-edged arches of radiating bricks, and the row of oriels on the south wall are all typical of the Chicago style.
